EmailTemplate.name: Triggered_Nurture_Campaign_Product_Download.Triggered_Nurture_Campaign_Product_D
EmailTemplate.subject: Would you like to chat further?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/request-a-demo]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, The challenges of today require more than traditional scripting and orchestration. They demand AI-powered infrastructure that offers decision automation. With the Turbonomic platform, IT organizations across industries can adopt trustworthy, full-stack automation and get back to innovation.
<[[https://turbonomic.com/request-a-demo]]> If you're ready, we'd love to have a one-on-one conversation with you to learn more about your team, your priorities and the challenges you face. With your input, we can take you through a customized demo of our platform and show you exactly where we can help you and your team.
Please schedule a meeting <[[https://turbonomic.com/request-a-demo/]]> with us today.
Regards, Team Turbonomic
